content: l a n a l a c e y 10 sizes mipi knitting pattern thank you for downloading my pattern share your make with me using the hashtag #lanalaceyskirt on instagram you can always message me with any questions @mipi_knits on instagram or mipi thelabel@gmail com about lana lacey is a comfortable knit midi skirt with bohemian lace textures knit loosely in cotton it creates a boho summer skirt and knit tighter in wool it can be a romantic closet staple lana lacey is knit top down with an elastic waistband then increases are worked on the sides there are 4 different hip sizes to ensure a perfect fit for your body knit the skirt to your desired length to cover the bum and add the three different lace charts that are worked alternating with purl details skill difficulty 2/5 knitting lace and increases gauge 15 sts x 17 rounds = 10 cm | 4 inch measured in stockinette after blocking needles 5 mm | us 8 needles for entire skirt this pattern is for personal home use only | © 2024 by mipi the label mipi sizing recommended size size hips a hips b hips c hips d length waist 1 55-65 | 21 5-25 5 70 | 27 5 75 | 29 5 80 | 31 5 85 | 33 5 90 | 35 5 2 60-70 | 23 5-27 5 75 | 29 5 80 | 31 5 85 | 33 5 90 | 35 5 90 | 35 5 3 65-75 | 25 5-29 5 80 | 31 5 85 | 33 5 90 | 35 5 95 | 37 5 90 | 35 5 4 70-80 | 27 5-31 5 85 | 33 5 90 | 35 5 95 | 37 5 100 | 39 5 90 | 35 5 5 75-85 | 29 5-33 5 90 | 35 5 95 | 37 5 100 | 39 5 105 | 41 5 90 | 35 5 6 80-90 | 31 5-35 5 95 | 37 5 100 | 39 5 105 | 41 5 112 | 43 5 90 | 35 5 7 85-95 | 33 5-37 5 100 | 39 5 105 | 41 5 112 | 43 5 115 | 45 5 90 | 35 5 8 90-100 | 35 5-39 5 105 | 41 5 112 | 43 5 115 | 45 5 120 | 47 5 90 | 35 5 9 95-105 | 37 5-41 5 110 | 43 5 115 | 45 5 120 | 47 5 125 | 49 5 90 | 35 5 10 100-110 | 39 5-43 5 115 | 45 5 120 | 47 5 125 | 49 5 130 | 51 5 90 | 35 5 11 105-115 | 41 5-45 5 120 | 47 5 125 | 49 5 130 | 51 5 135 | 53 5 90 | 35 5 12 110-120 | 43 5-49 5 125 | 49 5 130 | 51
